scripts.build: rimraf build/ && tsc && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/**/*.json src/**/*.js src/manifest.json build/ && web-ext --config=web-ext.config.js build --ignore-files "**/*.ts"
scripts.dev: web-ext run --config build & tsc --watch & nodemon -e css,html,json,js --watch src/ --ignore 'src/*.ts' --exec "npm run copy"
scripts.copy: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/**/*.json src/**/*.js build/
